metadata.Title: CVE-2018-6521 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: The sqlauth module in SimpleSAMLphp before 1.15.2 relies on the MySQL utf8 charset, which truncates queries upon encountering four-byte characters. There might be a scenario in which this allows remote attackers to bypass intended access restrictions.

notes.Note: msalvatore> According to the security advisory, "there is no known way to exploit the issue." There are 2 mitigating factors. See the SimpleSAMLphp advisory for more details.

criterions.comment: simplesamlphp package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
